location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from William Bruce, Acting Resident at Bushire to Jonathan Duncan, President and Governor in Council, Bombay

mods.abstract: The letter is informing the Bombay Government that Rahma Ben Jabber [Raḥmah bin Jābir], having embarked on a cruising expedition, has joined up with boats from the Joasimese [Qāsimī] tribe and taken a brig belonging to Abdulla Aga, causing much loss of life in the process. It further notes that William Bruce fears that this may give them the confidence to start attacking British vessels once again.
